definition: a piece of calcite or a similar substance, usually in the shape of a crayon, that is used to write or draw on blackboards or other flat surfaces, to write, draw, or trace with chalk
details:
noun
- a piece of calcite or a similar substance, usually in the shape of a crayon, that is used to write or draw on blackboards or other flat surfaces
- an amphetamine derivative (trade name Methedrine) used in the form of a crystalline hydrochloride
= synonyms: crank
- a pure flat white with little reflectance
- a soft whitish calcite
verb
- to write, draw, or trace with chalk
